particpant.description: Checks if java message format patterns match in template and translation. E.g. if the template language contains "{0}", then the translation must contain "{0}" as well
particpant.name: Message Format Check

particpant.description: Warns if the template and the translated string are identical
particpant.name: Equality Check

particpant.description: Checks if a property exists in both template and translation language
particpant.name: Existence Check

particpant.description: checks that terms from the terminology project are properly translated
particpant.name: Terminology Check

job.description: Deletes translated strings that are missing in the template language
job.name: Translation Cleanup
